snippet: Directors at Procter & Gamble have backed the consumer products giant's chief executive, Robert A. McDonald, and his plan to turn around the company, setting up a potential fight with the activist investor William A. Ackman.
abstract: Directors at Procter & Gamble have backed the consumer products giant's chief executive, Robert A. McDonald, and his plan to turn around the company, setting up a potential fight with the activist investor William A. Ackman.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Procter & Gamble Board Backs Company's Chief
